title: Key of Max Value
description: In Python, dictionaries are a useful data structure that allows you to store key-value pairs. Sometimes, you may need to find the key of the maximum value in a dictionary. In this challenge, you will write a function that takes a dictionary as an argument and returns the key of the maximum value in the dictionary.

meta.title: How to Find key with Max Value in Python Dictionary
meta.description: Learn how to find the key with maximum value in Python dictionary using max(), lambda, and dictionary methods. Step-by-step guide with practical examples for efficient dictionary operations.
meta.keywords: key, python, dictionary, programming, max value

verify.name: Verify Key of Maximum Value
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 最大值的键
i18n.description: 在Python中，字典是一种有用的数据结构，可让你存储键值对。有时，你可能需要找到字典中最大值的键。在这个挑战中，你将编写一个函数，该函数以字典作为参数，并返回字典中最大值的键。

meta.title: 如何在Python字典中找到具有最大值的键
meta.description: 学习如何使用max()、lambda和字典方法在Python字典中找到具有最大值的键。通过实际示例的分步指南，实现高效的字典操作。
meta.keywords: 键, Python, 字典, 编程, 最大值

verify.name: 验证最大值的键
